text:
Hi! I'm Florian and I just want to make content what it should be - adaptive, interactive, interconnected and non-intrusive.
Specifically, I'm working on making complex documents & knowledge bases easy to traverse using the powers of modern natural language processing, graph knowledge bases and good interaction design.

Previously, I've built indie games, a machine learning framework, and infrastructure for distributed finance (all on my Github, see <https://github.com/flotothemoon>).

Looking forward to discussing and sharing ideas :slightly_smiling_face:
